synopsis.text: Will Ruby, a cheerful white Japanese hare, and her eclectic group of friends, known as 'the Leftovers' in the Plum class at Sunshine Academy, be able to overcome their differences, navigate their complicated love lives, and find their dreams before they graduate? Join Ruby and her roommate Kanon as they navigate high school life in Jewel Land, facing hilarious situations and learning to work together despite their initial dislike for each other. With a love triangle brewing between Ruby, Kanon, and Mikage, tensions rise and friendships are put to the test. Will Ruby and her friends be able to graduate and follow their dreams, or will their complicated relationships hold them back?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
